mapper.select: SELECT userid, nickname, nameid, iconurl, password, encryption, phonenumber, registertime, lastlogintime FROM rtuser WHERE phonenumber = #{phonenumber}
SELECT userid, nickname, nameid, iconurl, password, encryption, phonenumber, registertime, lastlogintime FROM rtuser WHERE userid = #{userid}
SELECT userid, nickname, nameid, iconurl, password, encryption, phonenumber, registertime, lastlogintime FROM rtuser ORDER BY registertime LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into rtuser (nickname, nameid, iconurl, password, encryption, phonenumber, registertime, lastlogintime ) values (#{nickname}, #{nameid}, #{iconurl}, #{password}, #{encryption}, #{phonenumber}, #{registertime}, #{lastlogintime} )
mapper.update: update rtuser set nickname=#{nickname}, nameid=#{nameid}, iconurl=#{iconurl}, password=#{password}, encryption=#{encryption}, phonenumber=#{phonenumber}, registertime=#{registertime}, lastlogintime=#{lastlogintime} where userid=#{userid}
